Articles.Content:
Also any ideas on how to have a plane take off while a boat fires a missile at it? Is there a plugin or something? I tried using mechjeb, but it says that I cannot switch vessels in an atmosphere.

i need this for a cinematic i am replicating (see work war K ep 1 on youtube)

Thx if anyone has any ideas!
if you use romfarers laser mod you can use remote control. made a truck drive around while i was flying.
